projectNestCourtReservation.name: Court reservation
projectNestCourtReservation.description: In this project you can add and edit players in the database, including creating virtual accounts for them services. Also you can create various services, adding, editing, and deleting entries in the schedule.

projectTournament.name: Simple tournament
projectTournament.description: On this page, you can add users who have previously registered to the tournament. The tournament is played in a single-elimination format.
